title: Shakespeare’s King Lear on stage
text:
Get enthralled by this award-winning comedy performance by Vinay Pathak, based on Shakespeare's King Lear. Through the eyes of an ageing clown, a man, a father, an outcast, a child, an entire life is re-lived to arrive at one single moment of preciousness.
Here is a clown who is depressed because he growing older, and has been forced to perform this play. He wasn't supposed to do this play tonight but circumstances have forced him to do this play about a king and his daughters written by, what's his name- the great English writer, who says that "the show must go on... guy; who says thee-thou-thy! And now he is stuck. This clown, can't even remember the playwright's name?"
Nothing Like Lear is directed Rajat Kapoor, while the role is enacted by Vinay Pathak. It is slated to be staged on October 10 (7 pm) Chowdiah Memorial Hall, 16th Cross, GD Park, Extension, 2nd Main Road, Malleswaram.
